fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You have negative attack like that one Bion role.
- During the day, swap the attack and defense values of every player except you. Can't use before Day 3. Also swap every other pair of values that anyone has that can be swapped.
- At the end of the game, play MARVEL SNAP but with all the remaining living players. You get half of them at random and so does the host. You can divide them between three locations as you wish. If you have more total Attack in 2/3 locations you win.
